#Selection Sort

##Codigo

1 for(i <- 0 to arr.length - 1)
  {
2    pos = i
3    for(j <- i + 1 to arr.length - 1)
     {
4      if(arr(j) < arr(pos))
       {
5         pos = j
       }
     }
6    aux = arr(i)
7    arr(i) = arr(pos)
8    arr(pos) = aux
  }


##Tiempo de ejecucion
